This is the best sweet treat place ever. Omar is so sweet and nice, great customer services. I definitely recommend the strawberry Nutella crepe with white chocolate.

I‚Äôve been going to Blazin for 2 months now (at least 2 times a week), treating myself with some sweet treats, usually Oreo Crepes or Nutella Banana Strawberry ones, and I‚Äôve always been happy with my orders and good energy of all the staff there! Great quality food and service. Highly recommended!

Delicious treats! You should definitely stop by there are various options. You can‚Äôt go wrong. Waffle cone was amazing! I also enjoyed the pistachio crepe. I will be coming back to try other menu options. Customer service exceptional!

I don‚Äôt understand why they have a different selection of milk shakes because they are ALL just milk and color put together. Didn‚Äôt taste like anything. No toppings either. If I could give this place a negative review I would. This is the second time I ordered from here with the same disappointment
Naz was my cashier and he‚Äôs so sweet . Great servings and food made with love from the team also .  I always go here and love it every time . Try it!

Waste of money over priced and does not look like the image they portraying on their site , and it sure don‚Äôt taste good !‚Äô
Poor quality!!!!‚Ä¶

I came here just once so far, and I'd say it already feels like it'll be one of my favorite go-to spots. Very diverse dessert menu, the fruity pebble waffle stick is amazing. The non-alcoholic blue mojito drink is SOOO good and stands out‚Ä¶
Great customer service , excellent treats. It will satisfy your sweet tooth. Please try their Dubai chocolate! The best.
Mark gave us amazing customer service along with a great presentation. Delicious üòã‚Ä¶
Great atmosphere and creative treats with friendly service Naz hospitality was very nice and supportive of my menu choices the milk shake was so good my girl finished hers before we left !

Nas and his crew gave me a warm welcome and I‚Äôve been going ever since their costumer service is amazing and their desserts are delicious my personal favorite is the chocolate covered strawberries covered in rich milk chocolate and a‚Ä¶
The food is amazing, the wait was a bit long but it‚Äôs very tasty and the staff are patient and nice
Amazing place, amazing customer service, amazing treats. I got Dubai strawberries with lotus cream. Shout out NAS who provided great service
Literally blazin treatz. Workers are the nicest out here. Made me a special drink and a special treat not even on the menu.

Nice spot. 4/5 desserts. Waffle tastes pretty good, much different they other spots. It has a cinnamon taste. Chocolate for the strawberries is a bit watered down, but if you let it harden a bit, it tastes much more chocolaty and creamy. However, the strawberries are somewhat expensive (more expensive than most of the other chocolate covered strawberry spots) for the amount given and some of the workers barely give you any chocolate. Paid for extra chocolate for my strawberries, and it was barely able to cover half of the strawberries in the cup. The whole top layer of strawberries barely had a drizzle of chocolate. Some days though they put a decent amount of chocolate. I wonder how much they would put on the strawberries if I didn‚Äôt pay for extra chocolate. So I‚Äôd give a 2/5 price wise. Location is a 5/5 though.
Got the fruity pebble waffle and brownie shake and it is amazing! Owner and staff super friendly! 10/10

Blazin Treatz is amazing! Their desserts are absolutely delicious, especially the Nutella crepe is so fresh and full of flavor. The atmosphere is cozy, and the staff is incredibly welcoming. A special shoutout to Naz, who is super nice and‚Ä¶

Always come to this spot with my girlfriend so many options and excellent service by Nas and the crew 10/10 I genuinely do recommend this spot if you have a sweet tooth be careful it can be addictive lol

I took my friend here on 3/26/25 for a bday treat & it did not disappoint. We got the strawberry stick and two crepes (pistachio & strawberry cheesecake).  The two ladies were so nice! Great customer service would always get me to return .
I‚Äôve tried most of the menu by now, and everything is straight up fire! The flavors, the quality.. just on point every time. And now that they‚Äôve got the Dubai chocolate.. NEXT LEVEL!‚Ä¶
Dessert and food across the street is a plus for me !!! Yumm

Blazin‚Äô Treats is a game changer! Their snacks are always fresh, full of flavor, and hit every time. You can tell they put effort into making sure everything is top quality. The customer service is on point, and they never miss with their‚Ä¶

Best crepe spot around ! Great deserts , amazing customer service and attention to detail , their Dubai strawberry‚Äôs are way better than over rated chocolate house, more strawberry‚Äôs , neater and 4 dollars cheaper !
The experience here was amazing , waffle sticks , crepes , milk shakes everything is so good. Store is very nice and clean and they have amazing service ! Shoutout to my boy naz!

Ella and Lilly did an excellent job helping me find what I wanted to try, I was also going to accidentally leave my headphones and they Alerted me about it great job service 10/10
Dishes 10/10

Tried the mango smoothie, cookie monster shake, and brownie blast waffle stick‚Äîeverything hit the spot. The smoothie was super fresh, the shake was rich without being too heavy, and that waffle stick was straight-up addictive. Naz definitely gave some great suggestions. Definitely coming back for more!

We are from Iowa.  The staff is very friendly and the desserts tasted great!  I got a yummy Brownie blast crepe and it is so rich and good, my hubby got a mango smoothy that was refreshing, they have neat colored waffle cones and my toddler was dancing every time he ate a bite of his strawberry ice cream.  We loved every bite of it!

First time trying Dubai chocolate also I haven‚Äôt been in the Bronx in so long but coming to this location it was awesome, clean, professional and friendly Omar and JoJo did not disappoint honestly the customer service was A1!!!!! The prices‚Ä¶

Delicious treats! Nice ambiance with good music. Perfect for casual dates. Best crepe spot in the Bronx. The staff is friendly and gives amazing customer service. If I could give more starts I would. 100% recomend this spot to everyone!
Naz made my experience great, deserts were so good, wil come again 10/10‚Ä¶.will come again

All I can say is WOW!! What a gem.  Not only were the desserts phenomenal, the customer service and genuine gratitude of the staff made this a highlight of our trip. Be sure and talk to Naz, the owner.  He‚Äôs super friendly and will help you find the hidden tourist spots like the stairs from the film The Joker.  Thanks, Blazin‚Äô Treats!!!

And be sure to check out their other restaurant‚Äî Blazin‚Äô Chicken‚Äîjust around the corner.  Just as amazing!!
